Package org.sontana

Class Pawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sontana.Behaviour
      • org.sontana.Pawn
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Actor
    public class Pawn
extends Behaviour
    Pawn objects are objects in an AbstractScene that are rendered.
    Author:
    Christophe Simon
